meaning_str.bing:
n. 屏幕；画面；银幕；屏风
v. 筛选；筛查；遮蔽；检查
网络. 萤幕；滤色；屏蔽

屏幕；（电视或电影放映的）幕布；隔板；掩蔽物；过滤器；（体育比赛中的）掩护动作；（植物或其他自然特征形成的）屏障
放映（电影等）；播放（视频）；筛选；遮挡；保护；筛查；调查（看是否可靠）；过滤；隔离；庇护；包庇；袒护；为…提供屏障；为…设屏风

1.en: If you can't bear to leave your sports news at home, sign up for "ESPN Alerts" by text message and download small-screen videos.
1.cn: 如果您想在离开家的时候也能收看体育新闻，那么您可以发送手机短信订阅“ESPN新闻通报”并下载电视录像。

2.en: Rather than an image of four generations of smiling Romani, there was just a pink smudge on the screen.
2.cn: 屏幕上出现的是模糊的粉红色，而不是微笑着四世同堂的罗马尼亚人。

3.en: Also , make sure that your screen is at a 90 - degree angle to any light source to cut down on glare .
3.cn: 同时，确使你的屏幕对任何光源都保持90度角来减少光的强度。

0.en: I'm appearing on your screen. Reading the words I'm saying off of another screen.
0.cn: 我在你的屏幕上。念着屏幕上出现的话。

1.en: How about at a game on the big screen? How about at a Foot Locker?
1.cn: 在球赛的大屏幕上告白？戴脚链的求婚方式如何？

2.en: We were at the game. This guy proposed to his girlfriend on the big screen thing. That is so tacky.
2.cn: 球赛时，有人在大屏幕上求婚。老套！

3.en: What are all those lights up on that screen right there? Those are flights. Those are the active flights in the system right now.
3.cn: 那些屏幕上的光点是什么？是飞机航班。这些是系统中活跃的航线。

4.en: You took the dot back to the main screen and that's when you found the first Easter egg ever put in a video game. The creator's name.
4.cn: 把方块拖回到主屏幕你就能找到游戏史上第一个彩蛋。那就是设计者的名字。

5.en: How clear is the image of me on that screen? Pretty clear. Do I look like I feel better? I mean, it's not, like, HD quality.
5.cn: 你在屏幕上看我有多清晰呀？蛮清晰的。我看起来像有开心点吗？也没有到高清画质啦。

6.en: Is that a big number? Well, everybody can throw around big numbers. But in fact, if I were to place one base on each pixel of this 1280 by 800 resolution screen, we would need 3,000 screens to take a look at the genome. So it's really quite big.
6.cn: 这个数字大吧？谁都能随便谈论大数字，但是，如果我把一个碱基放在这个1280×800屏幕的一个像素上，得要三千个屏幕一睹人类基因组。所以这是非常大的。

7.en: Someday soon, your phone will have a little 5K on its screen a fifth generation wireless technology that will make it run faster and work better.
7.cn: 在不久的将来，你的手机屏幕上将会显示5K标志，第5代无线技术可以让手机速度更快，运行更流畅。

8.en: Now, you take that away, and I don't know what this country has left. Except a group of grown men standing around in a circle, all staring at a small screen. Looking in instead of looking out.
8.cn: 要是你把这个夺走，我不知道这国家还剩下什么。只剩下一群成年男人围成一圈，盯着一小块屏幕，只向内看而不往外面看。

9.cn: 你的网名怎么叫"约翰·威廉姆斯"？

10.en: Try and see if you can find the real tablet on this screen.
10.cn: 试试看你能不能在这个画面里找到真正的药丸。

11.en: So from here, we'll jump to a green-screen shot of you laughing, too.
11.cn: 从这里，我们用绿色背景拍摄一幕你也在大笑的样子。

12.en: It's not a blue screen. It's just, maybe it was just really clear that day.
12.cn: 那不是蓝背景，那是，也许那天万里晴空吧。

13.en: I want the whole world to see Ahmadi's capture on every news outlet and every screen.
13.cn: 我要全世界看到艾哈迈迪被逮捕铺天盖地地报道。

14.en: Porn belongs on a big screen in the bedroom or your phone in the bathroom. Kids, go play.
14.cn: 色情作品应该在卧室的大电视里播放，或是浴室里的手机上。孩子们，去玩。

15.en: Grant Irvin. Scabbit screen name: "Lotion my feet." "Lotion my feet"? Really? Yes. It's a joke.
15.cn: 格兰特·艾文，「瞎掰网」的用户名是「洗脚大仙」，「洗脚大仙」，真的吗？真的 ， 是个玩笑。

16.en: Honey, this is a picture of the frame guy posing in front of a bright blue screen with a collie.
16.cn: 这是一张相框模特儿，跟一只牧羊犬站在浅蓝背景前的照片。

17.en: I don't need this lesson. I'm very familiar with the touch screen. Let's just say I put the "Goo" in Google.
17.cn: 我不需要学这个触摸屏，我熟到不行，谷哥的"哥"叫的就是我。

18.en: What the hell's going on over there? First of all, Ash, do not "Aw" every time my sister Kate comes on the screen.
18.cn: 这到底是怎么回事？首先，亚瑟，别我妹妹凯特一出现你就发出怪叫。

19.en: Seedy underbelly? You know, your black market phasers, your screen worn Lieutenant Uhura panties, that kind of stuff.
19.cn: 黑市？你那个黑市淘来的手提式相位枪，还有乌拉中尉在电影中穿过的内裤，就那些东西呗。
